image.title: <font color="#FFFFFF">LIQUID TEMPLATE</font>
image.description:
Welcome to my new template!

Includes a 2 level menu, deep linking and 9 reusable modules.

Each module comes with its own liquid transitions and can be duplicated easily from the xml file.
